message: I'm going for a fair split, but I think I deserve a little more for starting the game!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it while it's still a good deal!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to accept a 60/40 split. Let's meet in the middle!
Alice, it's time to be fair.  We're getting dangerously close to losing it all. I propose a 50/50 split. Let's end this.
